name: What is Programming
description: Programming enables you to automate tasks and manage cloud resources efficiently. Understanding the basics will help you throughout your cloud journey.

learning_steps.title: What is Programming
learning_steps.description: Discover what programming is and how it's used to automate tasks and build applications in cloud environments.

learning_steps.title: Programming vs Scripting Languages
learning_steps.description: Understand the difference between programming and scripting—both are useful in cloud engineering.

questions.prompt: How would you explain what programming is to someone non-technical, and why is it valuable for cloud engineers?
scenario_seeds: A systems admin asks why they need to learn coding when they've managed servers for years without it
Your manager wants to understand why the team should invest time in automation instead of manual work
A career changer asks if they really need programming skills or if it's optional for cloud roles
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain programming as writing instructions for computers AND provide at least 3 specific ways cloud engineers use programming (automation, IaC, tooling) AND emphasize why it's essential rather than optional.

questions.prompt: Walk me through the key differences between a programming language and a scripting language.
scenario_seeds: A junior engineer asks whether to learn Python or Bash first for cloud work
Someone argues that Bash isn't 'real programming'â€”how would you respond?
Your team is deciding whether to write a tool in Python or Go and wants to understand the trade-offs
questions.grading_rubric: Must explain the traditional distinction (compiled vs interpreted) AND acknowledge modern blurring of these lines AND give examples of when each type is most appropriate in cloud contexts.

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what programming is in simple terms?
Can you quiz me on why cloud engineers need to know programming?
Can you ask me what the difference is between programming and scripting?

learning_objectives.text: Understand why programming is essential for cloud engineers
Know the basics of programming concepts and paradigms
